mapper.sql: id, func_no, func_name, type,func_type, version, description, state, resource, created_by, created_time, modified_by, modified_time
mapper.insert: insert into demo_function (func_no, type,func_type, version, description, state, resource, func_name, created_by, created_time, modified_by, modified_time) values (#{funcNo}, #{type},#{funcType}, #{version}, #{description}, #{state}, #{resource}, #{funcName}, #{createdBy}, #{createdTime}, #{modifiedBy}, #{modifiedTime})
mapper.update: update demo_function set func_type = #{funcType}, func_name = #{funcName}, version = #{version}, description = #{description}, state = #{state}, resource = #{resource}, modified_by = #{modifiedBy}, modified_time = #{modifiedTime} where id = #{id}
